title: Does making a new account make you worse at league?
body: Before i get bashed on for smurfing, I'm only making it to play with friends who are new.  However, I'm asking if playing at such an easy level will make me any worse

replies.body: Yeah, running into dem diamond level 5 smurfs aint fun. Nopenopenopenopenopenopenopenopenopenopenopenope

Read that as " Nope nope open open open open open open nope"
Something's not right there...
Rofl. I -think- I typed it right. But then again, I look at it and see the same thing, so... I guess it's just confusing. XD
Yes, you will pick up bad habits from playing low end games

I mean, it's a weird question to answer, because the opposite is also true. Rather, what works on one level of play will not work in another, and you must adjust accordingly.

It's one of the issues of being in Silver. Other players believe they should be playing as if they were in Challenger, though the dynamics are so radically different that it can actually be detrimental to try (since they are of course only imitating, not understanding fully what they're doing, just that they think they should be doing it in some way and will frequently die trying things of which they have little to no understanding).

So...There's no clear yes or no, but you'll be adjusting.
Yeah, I get matched up with other smurfs, and then I wind up feeding really hard, since I expect them all to suck.
You will probably get matched with other smurfs, bringing your new friends into a very un-fun environment.
If you can tolerate the enormous strength difference between your main & the newbies who always backs after being hit once, then it's up to you.
I have to be honest with you, Once you get used to that level of plays, you will get quite a bit of losing streak after hopping back on your main, esp in ranked
